name: Amazeing (Quantum Quantonium)
description:
Coming 2020! To experience what the game has to offer right now, play the demo FOR FREE! Scroll down below to download the demo for Linux or Windows!!!

Check out the dev blog to stay updated! Blog here!

Enter a mystic and relaxing world, filled with shiny rolling hills, flashing and shimmering living cubes, and other secrets across the landscape.

Travel between 10 unique mazes with varying difficulty and mechanics, collecting items such as cubes and ammunition, to help you get past a wall, up to a higher ground, or find a hidden trophy, solving unique mazes filled with hidden secrets.

Expand your collection of unique trophies as you discover hidden items and achievements across the levels. And with most achievements comes a unique skin to customize your own unique gameplay experience.

The full Amazeing game will include:

  • Mystic world filled with mysterious cubes, waving plants, a mysterious evil entity, and more
  • 10 unique mazes with over 50 secret trophies and achievements in total to discover
  • Unique environments that tell how the world you're exploring is changing
  • A mysterious evil which you must destroy in the final level
  • A relaxing and custom OST

The demo currently includes 3+ levels with many achievements and secrets to discover. Try it out now with the download links below!

To follow along with development, be sure to check out the dev blog! Blog link here!
